widgets.onValue:
let target ="button_" + (value[0]+1)
let vol = "volume_" + (value[0]+1)
let data = {
  track: value[0]+1,
  name: value[1].replace('"','').replace('"',''),
  color: value[2],
  volume: parseFloat(value[5]),
  volumeId: parseInt(value[4])
}
setVar(target,"data",data)
setVar(target,"color",data.color)
setVar(target,"label",data.name)
setVar(vol,"color",data.color)
set(vol,data.volume)
setVar(vol,"device",data.volumeId)
setVar("menu_devices","color",data.color)

set(this,"Tracks : " + value[0])
set("song","Song : " + value[1])
